titles.title: I Must Needs Go Home By The Way Of The Cross

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I must needs go home by the way of the cross.
There's no other way but this.
I will ne'er gain sight of the gates of light,
If the way of the cross I miss.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, the way of the cross leads home. (2x)
It is sweet to know, as I onward go,
The way of the cross leads home.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So I bid farewell to the ways of the world,
To walk in them nevermore.
For He bids me come, and I seek my home,
Where He stands at the open door.
